name: The Umbrella
description:
This is a game we made for Godot's Game Jam 2016/2017.

This is our first game made with Godot.

Please consider donating for better games :)

If you do not want to donate, then at least share our website :P

You are a cat lover standing at the buss station.

It is raining and you notice a cat.

You wanna keep that cat dry, so you hold your umbrella above the cat.

The cat is very playful, he runs around the rain.

You MUST follow him and keep him dry.

Use left and right arrow keys to move

Visit wisdomworkshop.github.io for more :)
